########################################################################
# Setup library
########################################################################
include(GrPlatform) #define LIB_SUFFIX

include_directories(${Boost_INCLUDE_DIR}
		    ${VOLK_INCLUDE_DIRS})
link_directories(${Boost_LIBRARY_DIRS})

list(APPEND strf_sources
    waterfall_sink_impl.cc
)

set(strf_sources "${strf_sources}" PARENT_SCOPE)
if(NOT strf_sources)
	MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ sources... skipping lib/")
	return()
endif(NOT strf_sources)

add_library(gnuradio-strf SHARED ${strf_sources})
target_link_libraries(gnuradio-strf ${Boost_LIBRARIES}
	${GNURADIO_ALL_LIBRARIES} gnuradio-blocks gnuradio-digital ${VOLK_LIBRARIES})
set_target_properties(gnuradio-strf PROPERTIES DEFINE_SYMBOL "gnuradio_strf_EXPORTS")

if(APPLE)
    set_target_properties(gnuradio-strf PROPERTIES
        INSTALL_NAME_DIR "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib"
    )
endif(APPLE)

########################################################################
# Install built library files
########################################################################
include(GrMiscUtils)
GR_LIBRARY_FOO(gnuradio-strf RUNTIME_COMPONENT "strf_runtime" DEVEL_COMPONENT "strf_devel")

########################################################################
# Build and register unit test
########################################################################
#include(GrTest)

#

#    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/test_strf.cc
#    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/qa_strf.cc
#)
#
#add_executable(test-strf ${test_strf_sources})
#
#target_link_libraries(
#  test-strf
#  ${GNURADIO_RUNTIME_LIBRARIES}
#  ${Boost_LIBRARIES}
#  ${CPPUNIT_LIBRARIES}
#  gnuradio-strf
#)

#GR_ADD_TEST(test_strf test-strf)

########################################################################
# Print summary
########################################################################
message(STATUS "Using install prefix: ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}")
message(STATUS "Building for version: ${VERSION} / ${LIBVER}")
